post:
I'm not sure if issue tracking is the right approach (terminology) but I'm looking for something that allows me to open cases and post messages (i.e log entries, action taken or metadata) to form a case.

Must be automatable (bots will be interacting). Preferably light weight. API driven or NodeJS integratable. Bonus points if data is stored on disk in open format like markdown or yaml.

Any suggestions?

Using github issues (on an empty repository) has crossed my mind, but seems to much work honestly.

Suggestions?
